name: Dear Future Me
description:
"Dear Future Me,

As I sit here, there is a space and time between us, but I have a hope that by the time you read this, that the space and time that separates us will have disappeared."

Navigate the invisible maze of possible mistakes you might make in life - try your best to avoid making the same mistakes the second time around and close the separation between you and your future best self. 

Made for GDevelop Jam 3: Separation

Controls:

Movement: WASD, arrows, or on-screen touch buttons

Game concept and design by Aaaahron and LeoW

Programming, Art and Letters made by Aaaahron

Music and SFX by LeoW
